name: Bust a Move
description:
EARLY ACCESS v0.2.4

Original Animation: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/419462446

The beloved animation is now a playable game!

Use the arrow keys to hit notes!

Complete songs to unlock others! (Early Access only has one song as of now)

Go for the high score!

CHANGELOG:
-9/30/2020 (0.1.0): Game enters early access.
-10/1/2020 (0.2.0): Added changelog, color to the arrows, an indicator of minimum passing score, and sound effects.
-10/1/2020 (0.2.1): Fixed a bug in the Game Jolt version where the "Double click to enable audio" screen would be too big.
-10/1/2020 (0.2.2): Fixed a bug where you could still lose points by tapping the arrows even after a song had ended.
-10/1/2020 (0.2.3): Made it so you have to double-click instead of quadruple-click to enable audio in the Game Jolt version, and color-coded the arrows different colors instead of just orange.
-11/16/2020 (0.2.4): Refined note timings and changed the "click" screen, as well as releasing the game onto Itch.

Songs used:
-WarioWare D.I.Y. - Record Makermatic (Takeru Kanazaki)
-Luigi's Ballad [16-BIT REMIX] (Starbomb/FACADE Music)
-Cucumber Quest - Noisemaster's Theme (Toby Fox)
-Dr. Mario - Fever [REMIX] (Hirokazu Tanaka/Crisel15)
